# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Follow SOLID principles for software design.
- Adhere to Clean Code practices to enhance readability and maintainability.
- Use early return statements to simplify control flow.

## Code Style
- Utilize enums for defining types of assets.
- Define constants for repeated strings to avoid duplication.
- Implement LINQ for data manipulation where applicable.
- Use ternary operators and null-coalescing operators for concise conditional expressions.

## Configuration
- Use IOptions for configuration management, specifically for the ImgBB API key.

## Separation of Concerns
- Ensure separation of responsibilities by organizing code into distinct providers.
